title: I can't open league of legends HELP!!!
body:
Every time I open LOL it says could not connect to the HTTP server. Please check that your internet connection is emblematic and that your firewall is not blocking access.
 
I checked my internet and it was enabled and I checked my fire too and it was not blocking LOL.

PLZ HELP!!!! 

I can't play LOL anymore!!

replies.body:
There could be a number of other local network configurations that conflict with League and could prevent you from reaching our servers properly. As your next step, I suggest working through the solutions listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as they typically resolve these sorts of problems.

Let me know if those steps were unable to resolve this for you.
can you give an video or something that will help because am so confused.
